extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for locking the workItems

      • removeLockedIssuesByUser

        public static void removeLockedIssuesByUser(java.lang.Integer personID)
        Releases all locks for a single user. It will be called by the logging in, for releasing of the locks which remained blocked by closing the browser window by editItem.
